channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Crafting your own cave: deployments made easy with Mina."
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Crafting your own cave: deployments made easy with Mina."

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: @Nikos, it's a bit of both, it's about what makes it different to Capistrano or regular bash scripts and why you should care but more importantly it's about how you can design and grow your deployment strategy to suit your needs.

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: Is the topic of this talk going to be only a presentation of how Mina works or is it going to include stuff like how it's designed, how it compares to capistrano and other similar tools, etc?
